00030 #include "winebinlauncher.h"
00031  
00032 WineBinLauncher::WineBinLauncher(QString prefix_name, QWidget * parent, Qt::WFlags f): QDialog(parent, f){
00033     // Getting prefix settings by prefix_name
00034     setupUi(this);
00035 
00036     lblInfo->setText(tr("Running wine tool..."));
00037     this->setWindowTitle (tr("Please wait"));
00038 
00039     QSqlQuery query;
00040     
00041     query.prepare("SELECT path, wine_dllpath, wine_loader, wine_exec, wine_server FROM prefix WHERE name=:prefix_name");
00042     query.bindValue(":prefix_name", prefix_name);
00043     if (!query.exec()){
00044         qDebug()<<"Can't get prefix info at Registry constructor"<<query.lastError();
00045         return;
00046     }
00047     query.first();
00048     
00049     this->prefix.path = query.value(0).toString();
00050     this->prefix.wine_dllpath = query.value(1).toString();
00051     this->prefix.wine_loader = query.value(2).toString();
00052     this->prefix.wine_exec = query.value(3).toString();
00053     this->prefix.wine_server = query.value(4).toString();
00054 
00055     query.clear();
00056 
00057     // Getting default patchs
00058     QSettings settings(APP_SHORT_NAME, "default");
00059     
00060     settings.beginGroup("wine");
00061         DEFAULT_WINE_BIN=settings.value("WineBin").toString();
00062         DEFAULT_WINE_SERVER=settings.value("ServerBin").toString();
00063         DEFAULT_WINE_LOADER=settings.value("LoaderBin").toString();
00064         DEFAULT_WINE_LIBS=settings.value("WineLibs").toString();
00065     settings.endGroup();
00066 
00067     settings.beginGroup("system");
00068         SH_BIN=settings.value("sh").toString();
00069     settings.endGroup();
00070 
00071 
00072     myProcess = new QProcess(parent);
00073     
00074     connect(myProcess, SIGNAL(finished(int, QProcess::ExitStatus)), this, SLOT(slotFinished(int, QProcess::ExitStatus)));
00075     
00076     connect(cmdCancel, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdCancel_clicked()));
00077     
00078     return;
00079 }
00080 
00081 void WineBinLauncher::appendWineExe(QString wine_append){
00082     //This is neaded for owerride /usr/bin/wine to /usr/bin/wineprefixcreate (for example)
00083     WINE_APPEND = wine_append;
00084     return;
00085 }
00086 
00087 void WineBinLauncher::run_exec(QObject *parent, QString exe, QString exe_args, bool KeepRunning){
00088 
00089     // Exec an a wine binary
00090     QStringList args;
00091     QString envargs;
00092 
00093     args.append("-c");
00094     
00095     if (!this->prefix.path.isEmpty()){
00096         envargs.append(QObject::tr(" WINEPREFIX=%1 ").arg(this->prefix.path));
00097     } else {
00098         envargs.append(QObject::tr(" WINEPREFIX=%1/.wine ").arg(QDir::homePath())); 
00099     }
00100         
00101     if (!this->prefix.wine_dllpath.isEmpty()){
00102         envargs.append(QObject::tr(" WINEDLLPATH=%1 ").arg(this->prefix.wine_dllpath));
00103     } else {
00104         envargs.append(QObject::tr(" WINEDLLPATH=%1 ").arg(DEFAULT_WINE_LIBS));
00105     }
00106         
00107     if (!this->prefix.wine_loader.isEmpty()){
00108         envargs.append(QObject::tr(" WINELOADER=%1 ").arg(this->prefix.wine_loader));
00109     } else {
00110         envargs.append(QObject::tr(" WINELOADER=%1 ").arg(DEFAULT_WINE_LOADER));
00111     }
00112 
00113     if (!this->prefix.wine_server.isEmpty()){
00114         envargs.append(QObject::tr(" WINESERVER=%1 ").arg(this->prefix.wine_server));
00115     } else {
00116         envargs.append(QObject::tr(" WINESERVER=%1 ").arg(DEFAULT_WINE_SERVER));
00117     }
00118 
00119     if (!this->prefix.wine_exec.isEmpty()){
00120         envargs.append(this->prefix.wine_exec);
00121     } else {
00122         envargs.append(DEFAULT_WINE_BIN);
00123     }
00124 
00125     if (!WINE_APPEND.isEmpty()){
00126         envargs.append(WINE_APPEND);
00127     }
00128 
00129     envargs.append(" ");
00130     envargs.append(exe);
00131     envargs.append(" ");
00132     envargs.append(exe_args);
00133 
00134     args.append(envargs);
00135     
00136     myProcess->setWorkingDirectory(QDir::homePath());
00137     myProcess->start( SH_BIN, args);
00138 
00139     return;
00140 
00141 }
00142 
00143 void WineBinLauncher::cmdCancel_clicked(void){
00144     myProcess->kill();
00145     reject();
00146     return;
00147 }
00148 
00149 void WineBinLauncher::slotFinished(int, QProcess::ExitStatus){
00150         
00151             if (myProcess->exitCode()!=0){
00152     
00153                 QString lang;
00154                 // Getting env LANG variable
00155                 lang = getenv("LANG");
00156                 lang = lang.split(".").at(1);
00157         
00158                 if (lang.isNull())
00159                     lang = "UTF8";
00160                 
00161                 QTextCodec *codec = QTextCodec::codecForName(lang.toAscii());
00162                 QString string = codec->toUnicode(myProcess->readAllStandardError());
00163                 if (!string.isEmpty()){
00164                     QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("It seems procces fail.<br><br>Error log:<br>%1").arg(string));
00165                 } else {
00166                     QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("It seems procces fail.<br><br>Cant read STDERR message.<br>%1").arg(string));
00167                     
00168                 }
00169                 reject ();
00170                 return;
00171             }
00172     accept();
00173     return;
00174 }
